thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very recommended !
thread.title_full: Very recommended ! - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: עדי ג
title: Very recommended !
text:
It was the first breakfast today at the hotel. We can't describe the service and the food.
Luana welcomed us with a big smile, and a great cappuccino. Afterward Erminio (we suggest to come to breakfast just for his passion and service!!!!) bring us a surprise every 5 minutes. Thank you for making our morning perfect!!
Galit and Hila Golan.
